description:
While awaiting his execution, Ace flashes back to a trouble youth spent seeking the truth about his father. Meanwhile, Luffy begs Ivan for a potentially-deadly treatment that will allow him to continue fighting!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inochi o Kezuru Chikara: Tension Hormone Futatabi
The Power That Will Shorten One`s Life! Energy Hormone, Redux!
Un pouvoir qui ronge la vie. Les Tentions Hormones font parler d`elles
¡Reducir la vida a cambio de poder! Usando una vez más la Tensión Hormonal
Сила, сокращающая жизнь! Снова Стимулирующие гормоны!
القوّة الّتي تُنقص من حياة المرء! عودة هورمونات الطّاقة!
命を削る力 テンション・ホルモン再び
